data.eml:eml: A new species of wolf-spider (Alopecosa ogorodica sp. n.) from the Russian Mountain Altai with remarks on Arctosa meitanensis Yin et al., 1993 (Araneae: Lycosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trilikauskas, Laimonas A., Azarkina, Galina N. (2014): A new species of wolf-spider (Alopecosa ogorodica sp. n.) from the Russian Mountain Altai with remarks on Arctosa meitanensis Yin et al., 1993 (Araneae: Lycosidae). Zootaxa 3856 (3): 443-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3856.3.9
